snippet: LEAD: Because California has one of the longest ballots in state history this year, several counties had said before the election they would enforce a 1919 state law limiting each voter to 10 minutes in the voting booth....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Because California has one of the longest ballots in state history this year, several counties had said before the election they would enforce a 1919 state law limiting each voter to 10 minutes in the voting booth.

headline.main: Long California Ballot Creates Timely Debate

byline.original: Special to the New York Times
